docs.snippet: With David Diehl sidelined six weeks after thumb surgery, Justin Pugh, the team’s No. 1 draft pick, has been penciled in at right tackle for the season opener in Dallas....

docs.abstract: New York Giants offensive lineman Justin Pugh is penciled in at right tackle for season opener against Dallas Cowboys as David Diehl recovers from thumb surgery; other football developments noted.

headline.main: Injury Forces Giants to Shift Offensive Line Again
